thread.title: Hollywood high-tech allows crack troops to train in virtual combat zone

title: Hollywood high-tech allows crack troops to train in virtual combat zone
text:
Up to 12 commandos at once can step into a virtual world 2015-09-16 14:59:59.963 Motion Reality 
Up to 12 commandos at once can step into a virtual world 2015-09-16 14:59:59.963 Motion Reality 
The 3D technology has been adapted from Hollywood blockbusters 2015-09-16 14:59:59.963 Motion Reality Navy ships to get ‘death ray’ weapon   16 2015 
Scientists at the defence science and technology laboratory are working with the military to develop the weapon, which is already operational on US warships Spies hacked Isis phones to track British jihadists Last updated at 12:01AM, September 16 2015 
The drone strikes that killed jihadists in Syria were aided by intelligence received after GCHQ and its US allies hacked an Isis messenger service Campaign to review sentence of Royal Marine   12 2015 
Royal Marine convicted of the ‘battlefield execution’ of a wounded Taliban insurgent should have been tried for manslaughter, a distinguished commando says Cameron backs drone strikes to kill British jihadists   10 2015 
Military force will be needed to bring peace to Syria, the prime minister said as he defended strikes against Britons Sponsored Editorial
